Regulation Name(s): Immunoglobulin (Light Chain Specific) Immunological Test System
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Siemens N Latex FLC kappa and lambda particle-enhanced immunonephelometric assays for free light chains in serum and EDTA plasma to aid in diagnosis and monitoring of multiple myeloma, immunoglobulin light-chain amyloidosis, and MGUS.
Indications for Use Summary: Aids in the quantitative determination of free light chains (kappa or lambda) in human serum and EDTA plasma, supporting the diagnosis and monitoring of multiple myeloma and immunoglobulin light-chain amyloidosis, and evaluation of MGUS, on BN Systems and Atellica CH Analyzer.
